99f38acd-1190-46ce-ab68-a91c4377e13e.description: After completing the VMware Cloud Expert Training for VMC on AWS, graduates are issued this badge. For more information on this training and badge, please email vmwarecloudexpert@vmware.com or reach out to your VMware sales team. Please keep in mind the training is invite-only and requires a member of the VMware sales team to nominate you.
